name: Celestial Clash Tower Defense
description:
Produced as part of a team for University - BSc Computer Games Design / Ba Game Art.

You're a key part of the Malacor Mining Industry - an interplanetary mining force based around siphoning precious resources from planets around the galaxy for the good of your people. Play as the Fury Fighter - fight on the front lines, defending live operations from undesireables threatening the mission. Some planets are tough, but the residents can be tougher!

Credits:
